entry.title: A Lonely Wolf Howls
entry.summary:
Author: brianRyanBio

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,827Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 15

Summary: In January of 2011 half of a woman's body is found in the Beacon Hills Preserve. As the Sheriffs department tries to find the second half of her body a series of events is set off changing the course of this small towns future and bringing together a pack of traumatized teenagers. In other words.Derek just wants to find his sisters murderer without Stiles and Scott getting in the way. Stiles wants Scott to admit he's a werewolf and to figure out what is going on. Scott wants to be a normal boy. Allison misses San Francisco and is just trying to fit in. Lydia is clinging to the top of the food chain. And Jackson wants to know where Scott is getting his juice.

entry.title: Stolen Bonds
entry.summary:
Author: Warner_Azer_BBG

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,797Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 29

Summary: Derek Hale is looking for his mate, when he gets a call from his sister, but when he finds her, he sees a dead body of the one last sibling he had left, but he found who he was originally looking for.Stiles has been having terrifying dreams or visions, for over a month of a creature, that kills innocent people, and he can tell the creature wants something from him, but it‚Äôs not what he expects.Scott has been worried about his best friend, but one night he goes into the woods and gets bitten by a wolf, but he didn‚Äôt know that. He doesn‚Äôt understand what is going on with him or his best friend.Peter Hale had bitten Scott in the woods not long ago, but he found someone much more interesting. Stiles Stilinski. Peter figures out that Stiles is Derek‚Äôs mate, but what he didn‚Äôt expect was that Stiles was his mate as well. This changes Peter‚Äôs whole path of his plan. His goal is to now, make Stiles his mate before Derek even gets the chance. No matter the consequences.

entry.title: What The Hell?
entry.summary:
Author: awholenewworld

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,051Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 38

Summary: What The Hell is going on?That's all Stiles really wants to know. One minute he is living his life as it should be, the next it is completely turned upside down. Not only has he suddenly acquired both a husband and child he knows absolutely nothing about, he also seems to be missing all memories from the past eight years!On a mission to uncover the truth, Stiles also discovers he must build bridges as well as mend broken hearts. Faced with so much damage, Stiles begins to doubt he has what it takes to put the pack back together. Luckily for him he still has one ally and he will remind Stiles that somethings are worth fighting for.

entry.title: A Spark Worth Killing For
entry.summary:
Author: Death_Cap

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,907Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Some sparks light the way forward... Others are worth killing for. Beacon Hills becomes a battleground not just for power, but for permanence. Derek Hale‚Äôs pack is growing, Stiles Stilinski is no longer untouched by the supernatural, and the bond between them? It's strong enough to draw attention from predators who understand exactly how dangerous devotion can be. As new threats close in and old ones resurface, the lines begin to blur. Being Alpha means more than strength. Being a mate means more than loyalty. And love, real, unyielding love, may be the most volatile force of all. A Spark Worth Killing For is Part 4 of the What We Leave Behind and What We Carry Forward series, a canon-divergent rewrite of Teen Wolf Season 3A that centers found family, recovery, and the cost of choosing each other anyway.

entry.title: Cuffing Season
entry.summary:
Author: dd0g90

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,222Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 29

Summary: " Cuffing Season" - The time of year between Halloween and, Valentines Day where adults form a couple to get through the lonely holiday season. Most break up February 15th. Stiles is in his last year of college. He recently lost his job as a waiter at a restaurant and,is barely making ends meat as a delivery driver. He's already delayed his education enough paying for a class at a time. When Lydia suggests an app" Cuffing Season" where rich people pay you to date them during the holidays.Stiles is all ears. What happens when he finds out the three men he is dating are related and, invite him to the same holiday party?

entry.title: Two Minutes
entry.summary:
Author: SashaDoeDeer

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,933Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 29

Summary: ‚ÄúThis is sheriff Noah John Stilinski of the Beacon Hills Sheriff‚Äôs Office. The date is February twenty second, twenty fourteen. The hour is six thirty-two AM. This is the questioning of Derek Hale, age twenty-six, regarding the events of Mieczyslaw ‚ÄúStiles‚Äù Stilinski‚Äôs kidnapping. Under California Penal Code section two-zero-nine, this case qualifies for both asportation and aggravated kidnapping. Life without parole is a guaranteed charge if a confession or incriminating speech to use in prosecution is recorded." Derek listens to every word. He's been in trouble with the law before and it's never really bothered him before, but this is new territory. He can't get locked up because then Stiles won't have someone to scent him, or clean his wounds, or protect him against the doctors from the institute who are certainly looking for them. Christ, Stiles must be so defenseless right now. Derek has to clear this up here and now; it doesn't matter how much he‚Äôll have to apologize to Stiles for saying every vulnerable, dehumanizing little thing they went through to his father.

entry.title: 'cause being your punchline still is something
entry.summary:
Author: whiry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 121,338Chapters: 21/21Kudos: 235

Summary: Born into a world of the supernatural and forced to segregate himself and his human peers from the supernatural creatures that inhabit Beacon Hills, Stiles grew up with the belief that integration was the key to a better life, thanks to his mother‚Äôs social work. Of course, that belief is only furthered by the mate mark he bears of his mate‚Äôs first words to him, something only supernatural creatures and their occasional human mates are supposed to have. Desperate to find his mate and carry on his mother‚Äôs work after her death, Stiles does everything in his power to unite his town, even if that means enduring dinners with Derek Hale, who hates him and refuses to speak to him. After a terse interaction, Derek finally speaks and the two realize they‚Äôre mates. Well, surely Stiles can still get his happy ending. Right?
